chinaye bijin nuwara pawathi aasiyanu shishtacharayan pilibanda jathyanthara samuluwa amatha janadhipathi garu maithripala sirisena mathithuma kala kathawa chinaye bijin nuwara pawathi aasiyanu shishtacharayan pilibanda jathyanthara samuluwa amatha janadhipathi garu maithripala sirisena mathithuma kala kathawa (2019-05-15) aasiyawe shishtacharaya pilibanda jathyanthara mattame samuluwak pawathwena awasthawe ee sandaha apa wetha arayum kirima pilibandawa china janadhipathi shin jinpin mathithumatath, china rajayata saha janathawatath mage gaurawaniya sthuthiya saha pranamaya me awasthawe di puda karanawa.
